# physicsWorld

**Instance Property**

The physics simulation associated with the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var physicsWorld: SKPhysicsWorld { get }
```

```swift
var physicsWorld: SKPhysicsWorld { get }
```

## Discussion

Every scene automatically creates a physics world object to simulate physics on nodes in the scene. You use this property to access the scene’s global physics properties, such as gravity. To add physics to a particular node, see [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKNode/physicsBody].
